text: Itte yaru ga i. `Ten to ji ni aru subete no mono wa, dare no yudearu no ka.' Itte yaru ga i. `Arra no yudearu. Kare wa jihi o o jibun no Tsutomu to nasa reru. Shinpan no hi ni wa, kanarazu anata gata o shoshu sa reyou. Soreni utagai no yochi wa nai nodearu.'Daga jibun no tamashi o horoboshite shimatta mono wa, shinjinaidearou
